name: Yaga.Run
description:
A Made as apart of the Portland Indie Game Squad 9th Anniversary jam!

The theme was "Cabin Fever".

Yaga.Run

The year is 4020, since it's discovery in the year 3000 magic has been outlawed by an oppressive regime.  Combined with the arrival of the Centennial plague everyone is stuck at home, well what people can afford to call home.  Despite all of the great advancement of science and technology nothing seems to slowing it down, worse the resulting  cabin fever has been driving folks into the depths of madness.

Somewhere in a junkyard, a lone hermit his cat.

"Well cat, time to become a magical outlaw in the farce of a society."

"Meow"

"I've got just the spell right here, inspired by the tale of a witch with a house with chicken legs!"

Controls!

Move: WASD / Left Stick
Jump: Space / Right Shoulder Button
 Boost (Item Required): Left Shift/ Left Shoulder Button
Reset Level: R / Click Right Analog Stick

Notes!
  • No you are not crazy there is no sound or music.
  • Escape Key or Start button to Pause the game!
  • Main menu only works with a mouse...
  • It's all a 'wee bit dodgy"
  • There might be more...
